blog.heading: C Program to Find Factorial of a Number
description:
#include int main() { int num = 5, fact = 1; while(num > 1) { fact = fact * num; num--; } printf("

 Factorial of 5 = %d 

", fact); return 0; }
class Simple{public static void main(String args[]){System.out.println("Hello Java");}}
